en:
A female figure standing 3/4-view to the right, with her left foot
      raised, wearing a belted chiton with shoulder straps, a high pony tail, holds a beaded
      necklace between her two outstretched arms, her left hand lowered; above, a female figure
      seated 3/4-view to the right, on a himation, with her legs crossed, wearing a short-sleeved,
      belted chiton, and a rayed stephane, holds a garland between her two hands, both held at waist
      level; below, a female figure seated 3/4-view to the left, with her legs crossed, wearing a
      short-sleeved, belted chiton with shoulder straps, a himation around her lower body, a
      sphendone, a black band necklace, and two bands on each wrist, holds her right hand on her
      knee, and raises her left hand above her head; a female figure standing 3/4-view to the right,
      with her weight on her left leg, her right leg relaxed, wearing a belted peplos, a sphendone,
      a beaded necklace, and two bands on each wrist, holds a garland between her lowered right hand
      and her raised left hand; a female figure seated 3/4-view to the left, with her legs crossed,
      wearing a belted, medium-sleeved chiton with shoulder straps, a high pony tail, a beaded
      necklace, and two bands on each wrist, dangles a beaded chain from her upraised right hand,
      and rests her left hand on a rock (?); above, the upper bodies of three women (the daughters
      of Erechtheus) emerging from behind a ground line, the first 3/4-view to the right, with her
      head tilted down, wearing a peplos belted over a long overfold, a kekryphylon, a black band
      necklace, holds her right hand above her shoulder, and her left hand in front of her body; the
      second, 3/4-view to the right, wearing a peplos (?), a high pony tail, a black band necklace,
      and two bands on each wrist, reaches her right hand to the right, and leans her left elbow on
      the shoulder of a female figure standing 3/4-view to the right, with her head 3/4-view to the
      left, wearing a short-sleeved chiton with shoulder straps, a black band necklace, and two
      bands on each wrist; below, a female figure (Attika or Ge), seated 3/4-view to the right, with
      her legs crossed, wearing a belted peplos, a chiton around her lower body, and sandals, holds
      Erichthonios, a nude male infant 3/4-view to the right, in both hands; the infant, wearing a
      taenia on his head, reaches up with both hands, his left arm raised, to Athena, lunging
      3/4-view to the left, with weight on her forward, bent, right leg, wearing a medium-,
      button-sleeved chiton, a himation around her lower body, an aegis with gorgoneion, an Attic
      helmet, and sandals; above, a female figure seated 3/4-view to the right, with her head
      3/4-view to the left, wearing a medium-, button-sleeved, belted chiton, a himation around her
      lower body, a black band necklace, and two bands on each wrist, holds her right hand on the
      rock, and raises her drapery above her shoulder with her left hand; below, a female figure
      seated 3/4-view to the left, with her head profile to the right, with her legs crossed (and a
      frontal right foot!), wearing a medium-, button-sleeved, belted chiton with shoulder straps, a
      himation around her lower body, a sphendone, a black band necklace, and two bands on her right
      wrist, leans her left hand on a rock, and points her right hand to the left; above, a female
      figure standing 3/4-view to the left, wearing a medium-, button-sleeved, belted chiton with
      shoulder straps, a kekryphylon, a black band necklace, and sandals, wraps a himation around
      herself, held in her raised left hand and her right hand, at waist level; a female figure
      seated 3/4-view to the left, with her legs crossed, wearing a belted, sleeveless chiton with
      an overfold, and shoulder straps, a himation around her lower body, a sphendone, a black band
      necklace, and two bands on her left wrist.
